name: Ants Took My Eyeball DEMO
description:
This is a free DEMO version of Ants Took My Eyeball! Full game coming soon on Steam.

Ants Took My Eyeball is an upcoming 4-player local co-op roguelite action platformer.

Descend into the perilous depths of the ever-changing ant hill, fight its denizens in fast paced combat and find unexpected allies. Explore the diverse regions of the mysterious underground realm of the ants, finding numerous weapons and items in the hazardous quest for reclaiming your eye!

ACTION ROGUELITE

Permanence of death makes it a serious threat. Use what you've learned about the world and the behaviour of its denizens to get further and further on each playthrough.

PROCEDURALLY GENERATED WORLD

Each adventure into the ant hill faces you with new challenges and opportunities.

LOCAL MULTIPLAYER

Explore the ant hill solo or with up to 4 players in local co-op. Lean back and play with full controller support or get hands-on with keyboard and mouse.


Wishlist on Steam: steampowered.com/app/1627890
Follow on Twitter: @antstookmyeye
Website: antstookmyeyeball.com
Press kit: antstookmyeyeball.com/press

Developers: Riuku, Reaktori, henrimikael + collaborators!
(full credits in-game)

Note: This demo is completely free to play, but you may pay any amount when you download the game. If you do, please note that this doesn't grant you access to anything, it's simply an optional way of supporting us in the development of Ants Took My Eyeball. Thank you for the support <3
